content.description: Which of the following can be used to store the string "jackalope" in the string variable animal ?
content.question: Select two answers.

choices.label: animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Substring ("antelope", 5, 4)animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (animal, "a")animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (Substring ("jackrabbit", 1, 4), animal)

animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Substring ("antelope", 5, 4)animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat ("a", animal)animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (Substring ("jackrabbit", 1, 4), animal)

animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Substring ("jackrabbit", 1, 4)animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (animal, "a")animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (animal, Substring ("antelope", 5, 4))

animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Substring ("jackrabbit", 1, 4)animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (animal, "a")animal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Concat (Substring ("antelope", 5, 4), animal)
